page.title: 15INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {A Butcher { Ron Taylor,}aged 72 and now past retirement age ,works a part time day,from 7 a.m. until 1 p.m. each weekday at Harris Butchers,in Worcester Road,West Hagley.A butcher has a variety of knives to allow him to chop,slice or bone the meat.Ron also packs and delivers meat by van around the Hagley area.Odd jobs have to be done,such as, cleaning machinery and sweeping out the shop.On Saturday, Ron visits his customers to collect money for earlier deliveries. {A Publican's Son { Andrew Dickinson}is the son of a publican.At weekends,he rises at 7.30 to wash up from the night before,helps with cleaning and 'bottling up',before having the afternoon off.In the busy evenings,he may help with the collection and washing of glasses.
